Pre-Game Insights: South Africa look formidable in every department. Their batting has so much power. Further, the bowling unit also has more bite than Sri Lanka’s.

Miscellaneous Highlights: It will be the first-ever international game at this venue.
The warm-up fixture between India and Bangladesh was a slightly tricky deck, for the start was not as fluent for the batters. Further, the outfield was slow at times.
A temperature of around 23°C, with no threat of rain, is forecast.
